trans-unit.source: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representa um ponto de conexão exibido nas bordas externas de um designer de atividade em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto de conexão aparece como um pequeno quadrado na borda da superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado como um ponto em que um conector pode ser originada no designer de atividade para conectar-se com outro designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o ponto de conexão pertence.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> enumeration value that specifies where on the activity designer the connection point is located.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> que especifica o local em que o ponto de conexão está localizado no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An index location of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Um local de índice do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> enumeration value, and an integer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, o valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> e um inteiro especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connectionIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connectionIndex" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connectionIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the number of connection points on <paramref name="associatedDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connectionIndex" /> é maior ou igual ao número de pontos de conexão em <paramref name="associatedDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="associatedDesigner" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="associatedDesigner" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity designer to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer de atividade ao qual o ponto de conexão pertence.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o ponto de conexão pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connection point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o ponto de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que limites de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge on which the connection point appears.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a borda do designer na qual o ponto de conexão aparece.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> that specifies the activity designer edge on which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> appears.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> que especifica a borda do designer de atividade em que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection index for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de conexão para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the connection index for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o índice da conexão atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer uses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex%2A> to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Usa um designer de atividade <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex%2A> para identificar um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> em somente leitura <xref:System.Drawing.Point> coleção retornada por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> atual é igual ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> and <paramref name="obj" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que os <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> e o <paramref name="obj" /> são iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código hash para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The hash code generated by the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex" /> integer or the designer available through <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O código hash gerado pelo inteiro <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex" /> ou pelo designer disponível por meio de <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a point that represents the logical location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> on the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um ponto que representa o local lógico do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the logical location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> on the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa o local lógico do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> em associado <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the data
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a highlighted connection point; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para desenhar um ponto de conexão realçado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs all tasks required to render the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa todas as tarefas necessárias para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> na superfície do designer de atividade.
